item.title: The Scarcity Brain
item.description: Idea 01: How Social Media Is a Casino The scarcity loop Casinos constituted a modest industry earlier. An entrepreneur named Si Redd revolutionized slot design. Addictive loop Opportunity The person must feel as if there is a chance to win something. Statistically, it is impossible; yet the brain must feel like it has a fighting chance. Unpredictability The reward or “win” must be given unpredictably. This keeps the player engaged. Repeatability Should be painless, frictionless, and quick to repeat.
